name: Lines (itch) (ghostek)
description:
Lines is a new puzzle game. It's easy to grasp and very addictive. Make horizontal, vertical, diagonal rows or specific shapes of the same color by moving squares across the board and get points! Try it out and you won't be able to stop playing it!

Lines includes great features:

  • Two gameplay modes: casual and challenges
  • Leaderboards: check your high scores
  • Achievements: unlock all
  • Nice graphics
  • Single touch gameplay
  • Designed to support both Phones and Tablet
  • Small size
  • Polish, English, French and Brazilian language suport!

Download now and set your own record!
